snippet: Three friends from Senegal with similar journeys were at Barclays Center as St. Joseph’s defeated St. Bonaventure to advance to the Atlantic 10 final against V.C.U.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Tournament Roundup; St Josephs beats St Bonaventure, 67-48, to reach the finals of the Atlantic 10 tournament for the first time since 2008; two teams' rosters include three players from Senegal who came to the United Sates to play basketball through the Sports for Education and Economic Development Program; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Three friends from Senegal with similar journeys were at Barclays Center as St. Joseph’s defeated St. Bonaventure to advance to the Atlantic 10 final against V.C.U.

headline.main: In Dream Game for Senegalese Players, St. Joseph’s Reaches A-10 Final
headline.print_headline: In Dream Game for Senegalese Players, St. Joseph’s Reaches Final
